item.description:
Hi! This is just to let everyone know that I will be playing at Tucker's Cafe in Fairfield on Saturday, July 28th from 9:00 PM to 12:00 midnight. It is ALWAYS great to have some familiar faces in the crowd. If you could stop by - even for a little while - it would be greatly appreciated. This is my first time playing here and an initial good turnout is very helpful towards securing future bookings. As this is a public venue, feel free t o bring a friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier! 

 

ABOUT Tom Ferrara: Tom a member of Party Express! and will be your event host. Tom performs a classic selection of acoustic folk and mellow rock that includes a varied mix of artists from James Taylor, Jim Croce and The Beatles to Green Day, Dave Matthews and Collective Soul. Tom has performed a number of happy hours, open mic nights, private parties, benefits and festivals. For more, check out Tom at: http://www.facebook.com/TheCaptainRocks. 

ABOUT Tucker's Cafe: This charming establishment is one of Fairfield, Conneticut's coziest hideaways.  Tucker's offers a full regular menu that includes the best seafood chowder and burgers in town, along with a selection of fine dining choices each day.  The daily specials include fresh seafood, pasta and farm-fresh vegetables.  Dishes are based on what is fresh, in season and change on a everyday.  The cafe tables are garnished with fresh flowers and linen tablecloths.  The bar and table service is always friendly, the food is fresh, reasonably priced and the atmosphere is inviting.  The full restaurant menu is available until midnight every night. For more about Tucker’s, please visit their website at: http://www.tuckerscafefairfield.com/.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Captain Rocks Tucker's Cafe
